sentences.chinese: 元狩三年，共侯古嗣，七年薨。
sentences.literal: Yuanshou third year, Gong Marquis Gu succeeded, seventh year died.
sentences.idiomatic: In the third year of Yuanshou, Gong Marquis Gu succeeded to the marquisate; died in the seventh year.

sentences.chinese: 元鼎四年，侯生嗣，一年，坐酎金免。
sentences.literal: Yuanding fourth year, Marquis Sheng succeeded, first year, convicted of tribute wine deficiency, dismissed.
sentences.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Yuanding, Marquis Sheng succeeded to the marquisate; in the first year, he was convicted of tribute wine deficiency and dismissed.

sentences.chinese: 元康四年，同玄孫高宛簪褭武詔復家。
sentences.literal: Yuankang fourth year, Tong's great-great-grandson Gao Wan Zanliao Wu commanded to restore the family.
sentences.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Yuankang, Tong's great-great-grandson, Gao Wan Zanliao Wu, was commanded to restore the family line.

sentences.chinese: 以客吏初起，從入漢，以都尉擊項籍、代，侯，比彭侯，千戶。
sentences.literal: As guest official initially rose, followed entered Han, as commander attacked Xiang Yu, Dai, made marquis, comparable to Peng Hou, one thousand households.
sentences.idiomatic: As guest official, he initially rose up and followed into Han service. As commander, he attacked Xiang Yu and Dai, for which he was made a marquis comparable to Peng Hou with one thousand households.

sentences.chinese: 十一年，戴侯章復嗣，二十九年薨。
孝文三年，侯復嗣，二年，有罪，免。
元康四年，驸曾孫長安大夫定詔復家。
以卒從起薛，以弩將入漢，以都尉擊項羽、代，侯，千戶。
三月丙戌封，二十二年薨。
孝文三年，戴侯執嗣，二十三年薨。
